Authors: Wibawa K.H., Kaburuan E.R., Wang G.
Title: Utilizing mde gamification framework to improve millennial’s interest of microinsurance in Indonesia
Source title: International Journal of Control and Automation
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara UniversityJakarta  11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Wibawa, K.H., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara UniversityJakarta  11480, Indonesia; Kaburuan, E.R., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara UniversityJakarta  11480, Indonesia; Wang, G., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara UniversityJakarta  11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Gamification is a technological development tool that has many uses. Attributes such as mechanics and dynamics that can be added to a system other than games make gamification development begin to be carried out in all business sectors. This paper aims at inviting millennial generation to be aware of the long-term insurance needs by using elements in the game. Millennial are known to learn fast in using new things and get bored quickly. While insurance companies in Indonesia think about how insurance products are made and assume their products can make all people want to buy insurance, but in reality, almost all insurance products fail to get the millennial market. An obstacle that usually happens is where millennial is confused in choosing the means to spend money even though they have small income. Microinsurance is the right choice for millennial generation in terms of insurance. As for the design of gamification in this paper using the MDE (mechanics, dynamics, emotions) framework which is believed to be able to attract millennial interest in having insurance. © 2020 SERSC.
Author Keywords: Gamification; Insurance; MDE framework; Microinsurance; Millennial
